title: rp payment method missing
body: Hey ive been wondering where the EC lastschrift for germany payment method went? its  not there for me, or do i have to reach a certain lvl to unlock it? my friends have it but its somehow missing for me

replies.body: I don't know too much about that payment method here in NA, but if you reach out to the EU billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) they should be able to get you all of that info!
